title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a detail\\-oriented
 **QA Engineer** 
 to ensure the quality, reliability, and performance of our software products. You will work closely with developers, product owners, and project teams to test applications, identify bugs, and improve overall product quality. This role requires strong analytical skills and a passion for delivering flawless user experiences.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents.
* Develop detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases.
* Execute manual test cases for web, mobile, and API testing.
* Identify, document, and track software defects using tools like JIRA.
* Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot issues and verify fixes.
* Perform regression, functional, integration, and system testing.
* Work with automation tools (Selenium, Postman, JMeter, etc.)‚Äîbonus if experienced.
* Ensure software quality at every stage of development.
* Contribute to continuous improvement of QA processes and standards.



  





**Required Skills** 



* Strong understanding of software testing methodologies and SDLC/STLC.
* Experience in manual testing of web or mobile applications.
* Good knowledge of test case design techniques.
* Proficiency with test management and bug tracking tools (JIRA, TestRail).
* Basic experience with API testing tools like Postman or Swagger.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Good communication and documentation skills.



  





**Preferred / Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills** 



* Exposure to automation testing (Selenium/WebDriver, TestNG, JUnit).
* Basic knowledge of SQL for database validation.
* Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter).
* Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git).
* Knowledge of scripting (Python/Java) for test automation.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related field.
* QA certifications (ISTQB) are an added advantage.

title: Associate System Platform Engineer
description:
At Brevo, we‚Äôre not just building a CRM. With our technology,
 **we‚Äôre helping millions of organizations build lasting relationships with their customers.**
 From emails and SMS to WhatsApp, Chat, and Marketing Automation, o
 **ur tools are intuitive, powerful, and built to scale with every ambition.** 
 We give businesses a clear view of the customer journey, so they can focus on what matters: connection.
   

  

 As a
 **certified B Corp** 
 , we‚Äôre proud to grow with purpose, committed to high standards of social and environmental impact, not just performance.
   

  

 Today, more than
 **500,000 businesses** 
 across
 **180 countries** 
 ‚Äîfrom NGOs like Amnesty International to global brands like Carrefour, eBay, Louis Vuitton, and Michelin‚Äîtrust Brevo to engage their audiences, cut through complexity, and deliver results. Our
 **reliable technology** 
 and
 **75\\+ integrations** 
 help them create
 **unparalleled customer experiences,** 
 without the usual tech headaches.
   

  

 In 2024, we reached
 **‚Ç¨179M ARR** 
 with nearly
 **1,000 team members** 
 worldwide. And we‚Äôre just getting started!
   

  

 Join us as an Associate System Platform Engineer and become part of our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have basic Linux and networking knowledge and a strong curiosity to learn how to manage and automate large\\-scale infrastructures (1500\\+ servers and our own network backbone) in a distributed systems environment.
   

  

**Your Impact at Brevo:**
* Participate in building, maintaining scalable and efficient system and network platforms using automation tools like Terraform and Ansible
* Monitor and optimise performance to ensure high availability and reliability using Datadog
* Manage and maintain system and network part deployment solutions
* Collaborate with internal teams to understand hosting requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs
* Participate in automation for deployment pipelines to improve efficiency and reduce manual intervention
* Help to diagnose and resolve system and network issues, ensuring minimal disruption to services
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of architecture, processes, and procedures


**Who you are:**
* Minimum experience between 2\\-3 years
* Basic knowledge of Network / System (DNS/Process/Disk/Network/Memory)
* Basic knowledge of scripting languages such as Python, Bash, or similar for automation tasks
* Experience in system and network management, including installation, configuration, performance tuning, and monitoring
* Advance knowledge of Linux and knowledge of an automation tool will be a strong plus


 If you don‚Äôt meet all the requirements below but believe this opportunity matches your expectations and experience, we still encourage you to apply!
   

  

**Why people love working at Brevo:**
* A place to grow, together : A unique opportunity to join an international and collaborative office in a vibrant neighborhood
* Practical perks for everyday balance: Cab Facility and meal vouchers per day; Employee\\-friendly salary structure with tax\\-saving components. 1\\.4x pay on holidays/weekends for critical work; excellent referral program with high\\-value gift options (e.g., bike, flight tickets)
* Learning, every step of the way : Over 155000 courses on Udemy
* Flexible for life : Generous leave policy and holiday calendar
* Wellbeing that works : NR 10 Lakh medical insurance fully covered by the company;
* A culture that cares: Bi\\-annual global company offsites and inter\\-office travel; Team outings, virtual celebrations, and birthday recognitions


**Our candidate journey:**
* Round 1 \\- Screening call with the Talent Acquisition team
* Round 2 \\- Interview with our Deputy Platform Manager
* Round 3 \\- Interview with the Engineering Manager
* Round 4 \\- Round with the VP of the Platform
* Final \\- Cultural Fitment Round with the Talent Acquisition team


 Whoever you are, wherever you‚Äôre from, if this role speaks to you, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.
   

  

 At Brevo, we‚Äôre proud to be an AI\\-first company. Still, every application is carefully reviewed by a member of our team.
   

  

 We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: Web Application Developer
description:
We‚Äôre Hiring: Full\\-Time Web App Developer at EaseMySpace
 
**EaseMySpace** 
 is building a full\\-stack
 **urban living platform** 
 to simplify renting, flatmate discovery, and end\\-to\\-end property management across Indian metro cities.
 



 We‚Äôre not building a side project.
 



 We‚Äôre building a
 **real product for real users** 
 , solving real urban problems.
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a
 **hands\\-on Web App Developer** 
 who:
 


* Loves ownership
* Ships fast
* Thinks like a product builder, not just a coder
* Wants to grow with an early\\-stage startup from the ground up



  





  




 What You‚Äôll Work On
 
 You‚Äôll be deeply involved across the
 **entire product lifecycle** 
 , not just isolated tasks.
 



  




 Core Responsibilities
 * Build, enhance, and scale web applications for
 **EaseMySpace.in**
* **Develop and maintain:**
* **User dashboards**
* Property \\& flatmate listings
* Admin panels
* End\\-to\\-end workflows
* Implement and manage:
* Authentication systems (OTP\\-based login via SMS/Email)
* Secure user onboarding \\& verification
* Payments, subscriptions, and transaction flows
* Notifications (Email / SMS / WhatsApp where applicable)
* Optimize applications for:
* Performance
* Security
* Scalability
* Handle backend logic, APIs, and database design
* Debug, test, and improve existing features continuously
* Collaborate
 **directly with the Founder** 
 on:
* Product decisions
* Feature prioritization
* UX improvements
* Convert raw ideas into shipped features ‚Äî
 **no endless meetings, no bureaucracy**



  





  




 What We‚Äôre Looking For
 
  




 Must\\-Have Skills
 * Strong fundamentals in:
* **HTML, CSS, JavaScript**
* Solid experience with
 **at least one backend stack** 
 :
* PHP / Node.js / Python
* Good understanding of databases:
* MySQL / PostgreSQL / MongoDB
* Experience building
 **end\\-to\\-end web applications**
* **Ability to think beyond code:**
* **Understand user flows**
* Spot edge cases
* Improve system logic
* Writes
 **clean, readable, and maintainable code**
* **Startup mindset:**
* **Ownership \\> excuses**
* Problem\\-solving \\> complaining
* Speed with responsibility



  




 Bonus Skills (Good to Have, Not Mandatory)
 * Experience with
 **OTP\\-based authentication** 
 (SMS / Email)
* Payment gateway integration:
* Razorpay / Stripe
* Hosting \\& deployment experience:
* cPanel
* AWS
* Hostinger or similar platforms
* Basic understanding of
 **UI/UX principles**
* **Familiarity with security best practices**



  




 Role Details
 * **Position:** 
 Full\\-Time Web App Developer
* **Work Mode:** 
 On\\-site / Hybrid
* **Mumbai preferred**
* **Reporting To:** 
 Founder
* **Team Type:** 
 Small, fast\\-moving startup team



  




 Why Join EaseMySpace?
 * Build a product from the ground up
* Real ownership ‚Äî your code directly impacts users
* Direct access to decision\\-making (no middle layers)
* Learn startup execution, not just tech
* Strong growth path as the platform scales
* Competitive startup compensation (based on skills \\& ownership mindset)

title: Senior Java Software Engineer
description:
**About Tarento:** 




  





 Tarento is a fast\\-growing technology consulting company headquartered in Stockholm, with a strong presence in India and clients across the globe. We specialize in digital transformation, product engineering, and enterprise solutions, working across diverse industries including retail, manufacturing, and healthcare. Our teams combine Nordic values with Indian expertise to deliver innovative, scalable, and high\\-impact solutions.
 



  





 We're proud to be recognized as a
 **Great Place to Work** 
 , a testament to our inclusive culture, strong leadership, and commitment to employee well\\-being and growth. At Tarento, you‚Äôll be part of a collaborative environment where ideas are valued, learning is continuous, and careers are built on passion and purpose.
 



  





 We are looking for
 **Senior Java Developer** 
 for one of our exciting project.
 



  





**Work Expectations** 




  





 We are looking for a strong Java Backend Engineer with AWS experience who can operate confidently in a fast\\-paced, security\\-first delivery environment. The ideal candidate will bring at least 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience building, maintaining, and enhancing Java\\-based backend systems deployed on cloud platforms, primarily AWS.
 



  





 A key focus of this role will be identifying and fixing security vulnerabilities highlighted by automated security scans and tools such as Wiz. This includes analyzing findings, prioritizing remediation, upgrading dependencies, and ensuring fixes are implemented without impacting application stability or performance. The engineer will work within a structured yet rapid deployment cycle, with production releases occurring every two weeks, requiring discipline, speed, and attention to detail.
 



  





 This role demands end\\-to\\-end ownership‚Äîfrom making code changes and validating fixes to deploying updates into production and monitoring post\\-release behavior. Proactivity is critical; the engineer should be comfortable taking responsibility, anticipating issues, and collaborating with security, DevOps, and platform teams to ensure smooth releases.
 



  





**Technical Skills \\& Expertise** 




  





 The candidate must have a strong command of the Java ecosystem, including Spring Boot and commonly used supporting libraries and frameworks. Hands\\-on experience upgrading libraries, frameworks, and dependencies‚Äîwhile maintaining backward compatibility and minimizing regression risks‚Äîis essential.
 



  





 A solid understanding of AWS services, deployment processes, and environment configurations is required, along with familiarity in navigating cloud\\-native architectures. Exposure to security scanning tools such as Wiz and the ability to quickly learn and adapt to new security and compliance requirements will be a strong advantage.
 



  





 Overall, we are looking for a dependable Java backend professional with AWS expertise, strong problem\\-solving skills, and high learnability to thrive in a continuously evolving engineering landscape.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you want to advance your career with the world‚Äôs first cloud company? Since 1998, Oracle NetSuite has been on a mission to deliver an agile, unified application suite that gives leaders a complete view into their business. Our team is growing, and we‚Äôre looking for people like you to help us make a global impact.
   

  

 As the leading cloud business system, NetSuite includes financials, inventory management, HR, professional services automation, commerce, and more. Tens of thousands of customers all over the world trust NetSuite to give their businesses the visibility, agility, and control needed to make data\\-informed decisions quickly.
   

  

 NetSuite is a place where you can build your career and have fun while doing so! We‚Äôre invested in our people, our customers, and the community. As part of Oracle, our benefits are second to none. Joining our passionate team means that you‚Äôre ready to take your career to the next level. With priceless learning opportunities, strong support, incredible innovation, and volunteer opportunities, NetSuite is committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels empowered and set up for success.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will work closely with other development teams, testing/automation teams, product management, and UX to define and implement a new product offering while ensuring the continued functionality of the existing system
* Independently/Jointly investigate, present options, review and implement completely new functionality OR re\\-architect an existing solution to meet growing needs.
* Implement solutions that includes database schema, business logic, and some presentation layer work.
* Use existing methods and best practices in software industry to create features and platforms with the highest levels of security, reliability, efficiency, and scalability.
* Analyze potential customer workflows and scenarios, investigate and reproduce customer\\-reported issues and resolve them as per defined service level agreements.
* Validate and certify peer engineers work to achieve high\\-quality product.
* Preparing test plans and coding Unit, Functional, Performance and Scalability tests.
* Participate in various scrum ceremonies such as Daily scrum calls , Sprint Planning, Sprint Retrospection


 Qualifications/Skills:
   

  

* Bachelor/Master degree in computer engineering or equivalent
* 5\\+ years of experience in developing software products with good exposure to software quality assurance processes
* Expertise in JavaScript and hand\\-on experience with TypeScript, with a basic understanding of modern web frameworks (React, Angular, Vue).
* Expertise in any of the development technologies : Java or C\\#.
* Should have experience in writing SQL queries.
* Should have experience in testing of web applications and developing automated scripts using any of the automation tools like Selenium or similar
* Exposure to various automation frameworks like TESTNG , Junit etc. Also, should have rich working experience with version control systems like GIT.
* Should be able to shift between technologies based on the project need.
* Intimate working understanding of modern web applications from database to browser.
* Excellent problem solving, troubleshooting, debugging and analytical skills.
* Experience in Advanced HTML skills: HTML5, CSS 3, XHTML, JSP would be an added advantage.
* Experience as a member of a scrum team is a plus.
* Excellent communicator in both technical and non\\-technical contexts.


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow‚Äôs technology to tackle today‚Äôs challenges. We‚Äôve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector‚Äîand continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We‚Äôre committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans‚Äô status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Senior Systems Software Engineer
description:
Job Description:
   

  

 About
 **Cloud Software** 
**Group** 
 :
   

  

**Cloud Software Group** 
 combines the capabilities of both Citrix and TIBCO, creating one of the world‚Äôs largest cloud software providers, serving more than 100 million users around the globe. When you join Cloud Software Group, you are making a difference for real people, each of whom count on our suite of cloud solutions to get work done ‚Äì from anywhere. Members of our team will tell you that we value diverse lived experiences, varied perspectives, and having the courage to take risks. Our teams are encouraged to learn, dream, and build the future of work. We are on the brink of another Cambrian leap \\- a moment of immense evolution and growth. And we need your expertise and experience to do it. Now is the perfect time to move your skills to the cloud.
   

  

 About This Team:
   

  

**Citrix** 
 \\-\\- the recognized leader in VDI, Desktop\\-as\\-a\\-Service and application delivery solutions \\-\\- empowers enterprises of all sizes and industries to enable secure hybrid and remote working, from anywhere, using any device. Our platform delivers high\\-performance user experience, zero trust security and operational cost efficiency regardless whether customers require cloud, on\\-premises or hybrid deployment. By joining our team, you'll have the opportunity to build cutting\\-edge solutions for 100 million people worldwide to securely access their desktops, applications and SaaS and web apps.
   

  

  

  

 Core Level Qualifications: Education: B.Tech or M.Tech in Computer Science or equivalent.
   

  

  

  

**Key Responsibilities :**
* You will be working on Citrix Enterprise Browser team delivering product value to our user base.
* Defining architecture for complex components working with other stakeholders like PM , CX etc.
* Implementing complex features.
* You will be expected to contribute in multiple projects according to business needs.
* Embrace Agile development methodologies ( SAFE ,SCRUM etc.).
* Unit\\-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
* Engage in continuous learning, both on the job and through available technical training, to develop knowledge and skills


  

  

**Skills, Experience \\& Qualification needed:**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field with minimum of 4\\+years of hands\\-on Software Development experience.
* You need to have passion for writing good and scalable code following design patterns
* Passionate and comfortable in doing code/design reviews.
* Demonstrated experience in leading complex business critical applications.
* Very good object\\-oriented programming development knowledge and hands\\-on experience working with C\\+\\+ for building desktop applications.
* Experience in TypeScript/JavaScript is an added advantage.
* Strong knowledge of Windows/Mac/Linux internal and debugging are must.
* Expertise in Multi\\-Threaded Programming, crash dump analysis.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**About Us** 




  





 Endian AI is a forward\\-thinking technology company dedicated to leveraging cutting\\-edge AI to solve complex problems. We are creating AI\\-powered tools to transform the Software Development Lifecycle, empowering us to deliver top\\-tier enterprise applications for our clients with unmatched efficiency. We are fully bootstrapped.
 



  





 Our culture thrives on innovation, fun, and hard work, fostering an environment where creativity and dedication drive our success. We actively engage with and contribute to the open\\-source community, believing in the power of collective intelligence to push the boundaries of technology.
 



  





**Job Description** 




  





 As an experienced Software Development Engineer at Endian AI, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and deploying software systems with advanced AI capabilities in our in\\-house tools and for our clients.¬†
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  




* Design and Develop Software Solutions: Work with our clients to design, implement and develop reliable, scalable and efficient enterprise applications using modern programming languages and frameworks.
* Full\\-Stack Development: Work across entire stack of the application include backend, frontend and the AI stack of applications.
* Leverage AI\\-Powered Tools: Utilize the company‚Äôs proprietary AI tools to enhance coding efficiency, automate repetitive tasks, optimize code quality, and streamline the SDLC processes.
* System Integration: Integrate AI into production systems, ensuring scalability and reliability.
* Research \\& Innovation: Stay current with the latest advancements in machine learning and AI, applying new techniques and methodologies to our projects.
* Open\\-Source Contribution: Actively contribute to and engage with the open\\-source community, enhancing both your skills and the community‚Äôs resources.
* Collaboration: Work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including data engineers, software developers, and domain experts, to deliver comprehensive solutions.
* Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, fostering a collaborative and learning\\-oriented environment.



  





**Qualifications** 




  




* Educational Background: Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, or a related field from a prestigious engineering college in India.
* Industry Experience: 5\\+ years of professional software development experience, including hands\\-on work with enterprise applications or complex systems.
* Programming Skills: Advanced programming skills in any modern programming language such as Python, Java, C\\#, JavaScript, or TypeScript.
* Computer Science Fundamentals: Have strong fundamentals that enables you to pick up new languages/frameworks quickly.
* Problem\\-Solving Abilities: Demonstrated ability to solve complex problems with innovative and effective solutions.
* Passion for Learning: Continuous learner, staying updated with the latest trends and advancements in the field of AI and machine learning.
* Open\\-Source Engagement: Experience with or a keen interest in contributing to open\\-source projects.
* Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, capable of articulating complex technical concepts to diverse audiences.
* AI Knowledge: Experience with LLMs/ML models is a plus. Bonus points if you're familiar with AI powered coding workflows.



  





**Why Join Endian AI?** 




  




* Innovative Environment: Be part of a culture that promotes innovation and creative problem\\-solving.
* Fun and Dynamic Workplace: Enjoy a fun and engaging work environment where your contributions are valued.
* Work Life Balance: By promoting a healthy balance between work and life, we empower our team to be more productive, creative, and engaged. Join us in building a workplace where meaningful achievements and personal fulfillment go hand in hand!
* Growth Opportunities: Continuous learning and professional development with opportunities to work on diverse and challenging projects.
* Community Contribution: Engage in meaningful contributions to the open\\-source community, enhancing your skills and professional network.



  





**If you are an experienced software engineer who meets the qualifications and is excited about contributing to a culture of innovation, fun, and hard work, we encourage you to apply.** 




  





**How to Apply** 




  





 Submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your interest and qualifications to contact@endianai.com. We look forward to hearing from you and potentially welcoming you to the Endian AI family.
 



  





**\\-\\-\\-** 




  




* Endian AI is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

We drive innovation in education, careers, and technology to create a smarter and more empowered tomorrow.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote position for a Machine Learning (ML) Intern. The ML Intern will contribute to the development, testing, and deployment of machine learning models and AI solutions. Responsibilities include data collection and preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, model training and testing, and reporting results. The intern will collaborate closely with the development and data science teams to help build efficient, scalable, and impactful AI\\-powered solutions, while staying updated on advancements in machine learning technologies and techniques.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong foundation in Machine Learning concepts, algorithms, and practical implementation
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit\\-learn
* Data preprocessing, data cleaning, and exploratory data analysis skills
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with knowledge of statistics and linear algebra
* Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a remote team environment
* Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field
* Previous experience with AI projects, deep learning models, or cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP is a plus

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you want to advance your career with the world‚Äôs first cloud company? Since 1998, Oracle NetSuite has been on a mission to deliver an agile, unified application suite that gives leaders a complete view into their business. Our team is growing, and we‚Äôre looking for people like you to help us make a global impact.
   

  

 As the leading cloud business system, NetSuite includes financials, inventory management, HR, professional services automation, commerce, and more. Tens of thousands of customers all over the world trust NetSuite to give their businesses the visibility, agility, and control needed to make data\\-informed decisions quickly.
   

  

 NetSuite is a place where you can build your career and have fun while doing so! We‚Äôre invested in our people, our customers, and the community. As part of Oracle, our benefits are second to none. Joining our passionate team means that you‚Äôre ready to take your career to the next level. With priceless learning opportunities, strong support, incredible innovation, and volunteer opportunities, NetSuite is committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels empowered and set up for success.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Resolve complex technical issues and make design decisions to meet the critical requirements of scalable, highly available, multi\\-tenant enablement of services in cloud.
* Independently investigate, present options, review and implement completely new functionality OR re\\-architect an existing solution to meet growing needs
* You will work closely with other development teams, product management, UX, and QA to define and implement a new product offering while ensuring the continued functionality of the existing system.
* Work with various teams/cross\\-location teams to integrate with the product and help guide the integration.
* You will implement solutions that include database schema, business logic, and some presentation layer work. You will use existing methods and best practices in software industry to create features and platforms with the highest levels of security, reliability, efficiency, and scalability.
* Expertise in mentoring other engineers in the team.
* You will part of team's recruitment activities.
* Participate in various scrum ceremonies such as Daily scrum calls , Sprint Planning, Sprint Retrospection


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC4
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow‚Äôs technology to tackle today‚Äôs challenges. We‚Äôve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector‚Äîand continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We‚Äôre committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans‚Äô status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Test Automation Engineer, AS
description:
**This job is with Deutsche Bank, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork ‚Äì the largest global platform for the LGBTQ\\+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.** 
**Position Overview**
**Role Description**
* We are seeking a skilled and experienced Test Automation Engineer to handle the quality assurance strategy and automation execution as we migrate and build critical financial crime risk platforms on Google Cloud Platforms (GCP).
* The successful candidate will be responsible for defining the manage implementation of automated testing frameworks, and ensuring the robust quality and reliability of our team‚Äôs infrastructure and workflows on Google Cloud Platforms.
* This is a unique opportunity to provide technical knowledge at the intersection of software development, advanced test automation, and risk technology to significantly contribute to the security, scalability, and success of our critical systems by ensuring consistent and high\\-quality deployments.
* The Test Automation Engineer is responsible for driving quality engineering excellence and providing functional oversight across multiple areas of the bank's overall IT Platform/Infrastructure, including test strategy analysis, development of automated testing systems, and strategic administration of continuous testing within cloud\\-native environments.


**Key Responsibilities And Deliverables**
* Strategic Planning \\& Development: Handle the planning and development of comprehensive test strategies and automation solutions to accomplish complex business goals, focusing on efficiency, scalability, and resilience of the testing lifecycle.
* Reliability \\& Resiliency: Build reliability and resiliency into all solutions by designing and implementing robust testing strategies across the delivery lifecycle (incorporating SRE principles for quality), and conducting comprehensive testing reviews.
* Architectural Ownership: Ensure automated test solutions are optimally architected, maintainable, and integrated successfully into complex, end\\-to\\-end business process flows, with a focus on financial crime prevention use cases.
* Driving Innovation: Proactively review quality engineering plans and standards to drive re\\-use of testing frameworks across the organization and improve overall quality assurance capability. Participate in internal working groups to drive the adoption of innovative technologies, tools, and testing solutions within the bank.


**What We‚Äôll Offer You**
 As part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that you‚Äôll enjoy
   

  

* Best in class leave policy
* Gender neutral parental leaves
* 100% reimbursement under childcare assistance benefit (gender neutral)
* Sponsorship for Industry relevant certifications and education
* Employee Assistance Program for you and your family members
* Comprehensive Hospitalization Insurance for you and your dependents
* Accident and Term life Insurance
* Complementary Health screening for 35 yrs. and above


**Your Key Responsibilities**
* Quality: Design, implement, and handle the maintenance of our automated testing frameworks and continuous testing workflows on Google Cloud Platform, leveraging GCP services for testing such as GKE, Cloud Storage, and Google Cloud's operations suite for monitoring test environments.
* Container Testing Strategy: maintain our containerized test environments using Docker and Kubernetes, driving best practices for performance and scalability testing.
* CI/CD Excellence: Develop and maintain robust, high\\-throughput CI/CD pipelines using tools such as GitHub and GitHub Actions, embedding automated tests to champion quality engineering across the SDLC.
* IaC Testing Mastery: Create, manage, and audit complex Infrastructure as Code templates using Terraform for automated test environment setup, ensuring consistency and repeatability.
* Operational Excellence: Ensure the reliability, scalability, and security of our applications through automated performance, security, and compliance testing, using monitoring and logging tools.
* Cross\\-Functional Collaboration: Serve as a quality liaison, working closely with software development, data science, and product management teams to define quality metrics and prioritize testing requirements.
* Innovation \\& Mentorship: Stay up to date with the latest developments in automated testing, cloud\\-native technologies, and MLOps, applying this knowledge to improve our products and testing processes, while mentoring junior automation engineers.


**Your Skills And Experience**
* Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience: Experience in QA Automation or Test Automation role, with a primary focus on cloud environments (especially GCP) within the Financial Services sector or a highly regulated industry.
* Technical Depth: Strong experience with automated testing frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, TestNG), programming languages (Java, Python), and CI/CD pipelines. Expertise in containerization technologies (Docker) and container orchestration tools (Kubernetes/GKE) for test environments.
* Security \\& Compliance: Strong understanding and practical application of security and compliance best practices in testing, including experience with security scanning and vulnerability testing.
* Soft Skills: Excellent communication, and collaboration skills, with the ability to lead cross\\-functional initiatives and champion quality across the team.


**How We‚Äôll Support You**
* Training and development to help you excel in your career
* Coaching and support from experts in your team
* A culture of continuous learning to aid progression
* A range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs


**About Us And Our Teams**
 Please visit our company website for further information:
   

  

**https://www.db.com/company/company.html**
 We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.
   

  

 Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.
   

  

 We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.
   

  

 ]]\\>

title: Offshore - SAP S/4HANA Utilities - Customer Engagement (CE) Consultant
description:
Role Overview
 



 We're seeking an experienced SAP S/4HANA Utilities CE Consultant to lead the modernization of customer service platforms for a Tier\\-1 utility provider. This is a strategic, hands\\-on role focused on migrating legacy IS\\-U/CRM systems to the embedded S/4HANA Customer Engagement layer, eliminating middleware complexity and delivering a unified, "Clean Core" architecture.
 



 Key Responsibilities
 



**Architecture \\& Implementation** 



* Design and configure S/4HANA Interaction Center (IC) for utility\\-specific workflows: Move\\-In/Out, billing inquiries, service requests, and account management
* Lead migration from SAP CRM 7\\.0 (sidecar) or ECC CS Compatibility Packs to S/4HANA CE embedded layer
* Build harmonized data models unifying Business Partners, Contract Accounts, Premises, Connection Objects, and Points of Delivery (PoDs)



**Integration \\& Optimization** 



* Ensure seamless meter\\-to\\-cash integration across Customer Engagement, Billing, FI\\-CA, and Device Management modules
* Implement Fiori\\-based Interaction Center tiles and agent workspaces to improve operational efficiency
* Debug and optimize BOL/GenIL objects, OData services, and performance bottlenecks in HANA environments



**Strategic Transformation** 



* Sunset IS\\-U/CS Compatibility Packs while maintaining business continuity for service and repair orders
* Enforce "Clean Core" principles, minimizing custom code and maximizing standard S/4HANA functionality
* Develop side\\-by\\-side extensions on SAP BTP for utilities\\-specific customer service requirements
* Collaborate with Billing, FI\\-CA, and Device Management teams to ensure end\\-to\\-end process alignment



 Required Qualifications
 



**Experience** 



* 8\\+ years in SAP IS\\-U/Utilities with deep focus on Customer Service Management (CSM/CRM)
* 2\\+ years hands\\-on with SAP S/4HANA Utilities for Customer Engagement (CE)
* Proven track record leading at least one full S/4HANA Utilities migration from legacy CRM or ECC



**Technical Skills** 



* Expert\\-level configuration of S/4HANA Interaction Center for utilities customer service processes
* Deep knowledge of harmonized utilities data model (Business Partners, Contract Accounts, Premise/PoD structures)
* Proficiency with S/4HANA Web UI Framework, Fiori Launchpad, and Migration Cockpit
* Ability to debug BOL/GenIL objects and optimize HANA database performance
* Strong understanding of meter\\-to\\-cash processes and FI\\-CA contract accounting



**Leadership \\& Communication**
